topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556385676368727898a40c00#post_556385676368727898a40c00
Imagine explaining to the cops why you were nude in front of girl scouts trying to sell cookies.



I'm tempted to watch love live cause the animation quality seems really good:
!http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/968/586/0b5.gif!
I can make all kinds of jokes about her booty, but nowadays it's really easy to tell if a anime is shitty cause most of the time really really shitty anime whenever something that requires fine detail will just completely just skip over actually trying to animate it and will just make a really terribad animation.

What I mean by this is that most of the time when it comes to modern anime it's incredibly easy to tell if it's worth your time because the ones that are legitimately terrible will just skip animating things all together.

To use an analogy if you look at Naruto shippuden you can tell it's bad without having to watch it cause the animation is really bad.

There's an easter tradition here where kids will go around and basically wish you a good year in exchange for candy

Last year, my neighbour's kids knocked on my door just as i was going to the shower and i opened the door just with a towel on

I gave them some cookies and they buggered off

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5563878a6368723fcb6b1d00#post_5563878a6368723fcb6b1d00
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556387136368727898900f00#post_556387136368727898900f00
So what you're saying is visuals are more important than a compelling storyline or characters?[/bq]
Not really; rather modern anime it's easy to tell which studios actually care about what they're making.  If you look at the animation of modern anime if the quality is terrible then chances are they don't actually give a fuck about what they are making quality wise.

There's a difference between a anime not having the budget to do everything they want and a studio just not caring.  A studio that actually cares will try to make the best out of what they have, a studio that doesn't care will just not even try.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556388626368722d45130f00#post_556388626368722d45130f00
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556387ef63687217798c0400#post_556387ef63687217798c0400
I was honestly expecting a longer post. And I was just fucking with ya BTW.[/bq]
Baiting me on this wouldn't work cause I know a fair bit about the topic of a company trying to make the best with what they have.

A studio that cares will try their best even with fucking nothing budget wise.
A studio that doesn't care will not try their best even when you give them too much money.

Example: Bones will try their best even if you don't give them enough money which is why they're so good.

On the other side the studios that don't care no matter how much money you give them their quality of work will be bad; even if you give them ten times the amount of money they need their quality of work will still be bad.
!http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/116/992/Naruto-quality-3.gif!
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
